verses.verse: "Observe <S%H8104><s%> the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%> and celebrate <S%H6213><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> for in the month <S%H2320><s%> of Abib <S%H24><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

"And you shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> from the flock <S%H6629><s%> and the herd, <S%H1241><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> chooses <S%H977><s%> to establish <S%H7931><s%> His name. <S%H8034><s%>

"You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread <S%H2557><s%> with it; seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> with it unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, <S%H4682><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of affliction <S%H6040><s%> (for you came <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in haste <S%H2649><s%>), in order <S%H4616><s%> that you may remember <S%H2142><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life <S%H9132><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> when you came <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"For seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> leaven <S%H7603><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> with you in all <S%H3605><s%> your territory, <S%H1366><s%> and none <S%H3808><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> on the evening <S%H6153><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall remain <S%H3885><s%> overnight <S%H3885><s%> until morning. <S%H1242><s%>

"You are not allowed <S%H3201><s%> to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> in any <S%H259><s%> of your towns <S%H8179><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you;

but at the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chooses <S%H977><s%> to establish <S%H7931><s%> His name, <S%H8034><s%> you shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the Passover <S%H6453><s%> in the evening <S%H6153><s%> at sunset, <S%H8121><s%> <S%H935><s%> at the time <S%H4150><s%> that you came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"And you shall cook <S%H1310><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> [it] in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chooses. <S%H977><s%> And in the morning <S%H1242><s%> you are to return <S%H6437><s%> <S%H1980><s%> to your tents. <S%H168><s%>

"Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, <S%H4682><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a solemn <S%H6116><s%> assembly <S%H6116><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> [on it.]

"You shall count <S%H5608><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> for yourself; you shall begin <S%H2490><s%> to count <S%H5608><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> from the time you begin <S%H2490><s%> to put the sickle <S%H2770><s%> to the standing <S%H7054><s%> grain. <S%H7054><s%>

"Then you shall celebrate <S%H6213><s%> the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Weeks <S%H7620><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with a tribute <S%H4530><s%> of a freewill <S%H5071><s%> offering <S%H5071><s%> of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> just <S%H3152><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> blesses <S%H1288><s%> you;

and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> you and your son <S%H1121><s%> and your daughter <S%H1323><s%> and your male <S%H5650><s%> and female <S%H519><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> <S%H519><s%> and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is in your town, <S%H8179><s%> and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> and the orphan <S%H3490><s%> and the widow <S%H490><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in your midst, <S%H7130><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chooses <S%H977><s%> to establish <S%H7931><s%> His name. <S%H8034><s%>

"And you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were a slave <S%H5650><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and you shall be careful <S%H8104><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> statutes. <S%H2706><s%>

"You shall celebrate <S%H6213><s%> the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Booths <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> after you have gathered <S%H622><s%> in from your threshing <S%H1637><s%> floor <S%H1637><s%> and your wine <S%H3342><s%> vat; <S%H3342><s%>

and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in your feast, <S%H2282><s%> you and your son <S%H1121><s%> and your daughter <S%H1323><s%> and your male <S%H5650><s%> and female <S%H519><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> <S%H519><s%> and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> and the orphan <S%H3490><s%> and the widow <S%H490><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in your towns. <S%H8179><s%>

"Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall celebrate <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2287><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> chooses, <S%H977><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your produce <S%H8393><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands, <S%H3027><s%> so that you shall be altogether <S%H389><s%> joyful. <S%H8056><s%>

"Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your males <S%H2138><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He chooses, <S%H977><s%> at the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Unleavened <S%H4682><s%> Bread <S%H4682><s%> and at the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Weeks <S%H7620><s%> and at the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Booths, <S%H5521><s%> and they shall not appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> empty-handed.

"Every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall give <S%H4979><s%> as he is able, <S%H3027><s%> according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He has given <S%H5414><s%> you.

"You shall appoint <S%H5414><s%> for yourself judges <S%H8199><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your towns <S%H8179><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you, according to your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with righteous <S%H6664><s%> judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

"You shall not distort <S%H5186><s%> justice; <S%H4941><s%> you shall not be partial, <S%H5234><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and you shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a bribe, <S%H7810><s%> for a bribe <S%H7810><s%> blinds <S%H5786><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> and perverts <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

"Justice, <S%H6664><s%> [and only] justice, <S%H6664><s%> you shall pursue, <S%H7291><s%> that you may live <S%H2421><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you.

"You shall not plant <S%H5193><s%> for yourself an Asherah <S%H842><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> kind of tree <S%H6086><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> for yourself.
"Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you set <S%H6965><s%> up for yourself a [sacred] pillar <S%H4676><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hates. <S%H8130><s%>
